description:
Our trial lawyers fight for injury victims and employees' rights. We've recovered over $70 million dollars for our clients. We specialize in the following personal injury practice areas:

  • Car accidents
  • Truck accidents
  • Motorcycle accidents
  • Brain injuries
  • Wrongful death
  • Medical malpractice
  • Defective products
  • Birth injuries
  • Defamation
  • Bad Faith Insurance Claims
  • Legal Malpractice

We also handle the following employment disputes:

  • EEOC complaints
  • False Claims Act (FCA) claims
  • Family Medical & Leave Act (FMLA) claims
  • Federal employee discrimination claims
  • Gender discrimination claims
  • Healthcare fraud whistleblower claims
  • Merit Systems Protection Board (MSPB) claims
  • Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX) whistleblower claims
  • Severance packages
  • Sexual harassment claims
  • Wage theft claims
  • Whistleblower claims
  • Workplace discrimination and retaliation claims
  • Wrongful termination claims

We strive to level the playing field for our clients. That way, our clients receive the same skilled representation as the powerful individuals, corporations and employers that harmed them.

We treat our clients like they're our family. That means we give every case the same degree of care it would receive if it involved a member of our household. Additionally, we give our clients our personal cell phone numbers. Thus, our clients can reach us whenever they have a question or concern.

We are Million Dollar Advocates members. Trial lawyers must win a million-dollar jury verdict to qualify for Million Dollar Advocates membership. Fewer than 1% of American lawyers earn that distinction.

We also won a $15 million dollar jury verdict in 2016 in a wrongful death case. That verdict was upheld on appeal in 2020.

Call us now for a free consultation. We look forward to working with you.
